Class Encounter

java.lang.Object
business.entities.Encounter
public class Encounter extends Object
Class to represent an Encounter entity.

    • Encounter

      public Encounter(List<String> monsterTypes, List<Integer> amount, List<Monster> monsters)
      Constructor to initialize an encounter with the parameters.
      Parameters:
      monsterTypes - list containing the monster types
      amount - list containing the amount of each monster type
      monsters - list containing the monster instances

  • Method Details

      Methos to get the types of the monsters in the encounter.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • getAmount

      public List<Integer> getAmount()
      Method to get amount of each monster type the encounter has.
      Returns:
      a list of integers containing the number of monster of each type the encounter has.

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(int addAmount)
      Method to add an amount of monsters of a new type to the encounter.
      Parameters:
      addAmount - integer containing the number of monsters of a type to be added in the encounter.

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(int index, int addAmount)
      Method to add an amount of monsters of a type to the encounter.
      Parameters:
      index - integer containing the position of the list where the amount is to be added.
      addAmount - integer containing the amount of monsters to be added.

    • getMonsters

      Returns:

      Method to add a monster Monster instance to the encounter.
